mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(ordernum, pronum, id, paymethod, payprice, orderdate) values(seq_order.nextval, #{pronum}, #{id}, #{paymethod}, #{payprice}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select ordernum from tbl_order where pronum = #{pronum} and id = #{id}

select ordernum, tpro.pronum, tpro.proname, torder.id, paymethod, payprice, orderdate from tbl_order torder, tbl_product tpro where (torder.id = #{id}) and (torder.pronum = tpro.pronum) order by ordernum desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_vbank(id, ordernum, vbnum, vbname, vbholder, vbdate) values(#{id}, #{ordernum}, #{vbnum}, #{vbname}, #{vbholder}, #{vbdate})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_vbank where id = #{id} and ordernum = #{ordernum}

select ordernum, torder.pronum, tpro.proname, torder.id, paymethod, payprice, orderdate from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_order pk_tbl_order)*/ rownum rn, ordernum, tbl_order.pronum, tbl_order.id, paymethod, payprice, orderdate from tbl_order, tbl_product where
(rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount})
and (tbl_order.pronum = tbl_product.pronum)) torder, tbl_product tpro where (rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}) and (torder.pronum = tpro.pronum)

select count(*) from tbl_order, tbl_product where
(ordernum > 0)
and (tbl_order.pronum = tbl_product.pronum)
select count(*) from tbl_order where pronum = #{pronum}
select count(*) from tbl_order where id = #{id} and pronum=#{pronum}
